name: Piano White Go! - Magic World on Music Tiles
name_original: Piano White Go! - Magic World on Music Tiles
description:
Piano Music Go! is one of the best piano games that more than 20,000,000 players have downloaded and played! It is a free music game that everyone can play. Come to challenge yourself with a piano keyboard while enjoying piano music.

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a professional pianist? Have you ever dreamed of playing piano songs like Faded, Little Star, Fur Elise, Canon or Jingle Bells on the piano? Now your dream can come true this year. With this piano game, even a child can play piano songs like a real piano expert. Play this music game with friends and family for even more fun. It makes your mobile phone become a magic piano!

✔How to play:
🎶Tap the black tiles (the piano keyboard) following the rhythm of the music to create the melody
🎶Don't miss any black tiles, avoid the white ones
🎶The game will stop if you miss a black tile or tap on a white tile
🎶Collect as many gold and diamonds as you can to unlock new piano songs
🎶For a complete music experience, headphones are recommended

✔Game Features:
🎶Simple design and graphics. Easy to play and everybody can be the piano master
🎶High-quality piano music soundtracks and sound effects. Just like being at a concert
🎶Battle mode creates the opportunity for players to compete with others around the world. The winner takes it all!
🎶200+ classical songs. Choose your favorite songs to play!
🎶10+ different colored piano game tiles to select create a different experience each time you play
🎶Hit great achievements to win extra diamonds and gold coins
🎶Single-player mode can also be played without internet

Any other songs want to play? Tell us! We will add to the game as soon as possible.

✔Support:
Having problems? Send an email to support@pianowhitego.com or contact us in the game by going to Settings > FAQ and Support.
